issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Tooling
components.description: General tooling: CI, lerna, yarn, gulp, esdoc, babel, etc

fields.description: The {{dependency-map.json}} is a file that maps micro-package dependencies together so they can be linked with yarn. The problem is this file is becoming exceedingly large. It's time to break it up and put each package's dependencies in their {{package.json}}. Note that this is not the same as NPM dependencies, so we may need a {{appcd-depenedencies}} property in the {{package.json}}.
fields.summary: Move dependency-map.json into each package's package.json
